content: As an AI language model, I cannot make recommendations, but I can tell you that the best strategy for a small business just starting out depends on a variety of factors, including their target audience, budget, resources, and industry. However, in general, social media marketing and content marketing are great strategies for small businesses just starting out because they are cost-effective and can help businesses reach their target audience on social media platforms where they are active. Additionally, email marketing is also a good option for businesses that want to establish a direct line of communication with their customers and prospects. Ultimately, it's important for businesses to experiment with different marketing strategies and find the ones that work best for their unique needs and goals.
